other_title: おジャ魔女どれみ ナ・イ・ショ (Japanese)
plot: Taking place during the middle of "Mo~tto Ojamajo Doremi" until "Ojamajo Doremi DOKKA~N", this series contains supplementary character episodes revealing secrets that certain characters have about their past and their future goals.
opening_theme: "ナ・イ・ショ・YO！おジャ魔女 (Na-i-sho YO! Ojamajo)" by MAHO-Dou
